Text: I can't get the audio to work.

Using the Haali Media Splitter (to playback mkv) is recommended:

http://haali.cs.msu.ru/mkv/MatroskaSplitter.exe

Download ffdshow here:

http://www.x264.nl/

And make sure that you choose to decode H.264 (video) and AAC (audio) during the install.

Having Nero installed should also give you AAC playback.
I know this is old but could someone seed, please.
